bio.part1: I'm a DevSecOps engineer with extensive experience integrating security practices into continuous development and deployment cycles. I've worked on diverse projects ranging from cloud-native applications to critical infrastructure.
bio.part2: My passion is building secure-by-design systems, automating security controls, and making security accessible to all members of the development team.

values.title: My Values
values.description: The principles that guide my DevSecOps approach and shape my daily professional practice.

security.title: Security by Design
security.description: Security must be integrated from the beginning of the development process, not added as an afterthought.
points: Threat analysis and risk modeling upstream of development
Automated security testing at each stage of the pipeline
Principle of least privilege in all design
Continuous education of teams on security best practices

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Process automation reduces human error, accelerates deployment, and improves reliability.
points: Infrastructure as Code for reproducible environments
CI/CD pipelines for reliable and fast deployments
Automated testing to ensure quality and security
Automated monitoring and alerting for proactive problem detection

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Collaboration between development, security, and operations teams is essential to create robust and secure systems.
points: DevSecOps culture where security is everyone's responsibility
Collaborative code reviews integrating security aspects

continuousImprovement.title: Continuous Improvement
continuousImprovement.description: Continuous improvement of processes, tools, and skills is necessary to maintain excellence and adapt to new threats.
points: Regular retrospective analysis of incidents and near-misses
Active technology watch on new threats
Continuous updating of tools and practices

quote.text: Security is a process, not a product.
quote.author: Bruce Schneier

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A selection of DevSecOps projects I've worked on, demonstrating my expertise in development, security, and operations.

project1.title: Secure CI/CD Pipeline
project1.description: Implementation of a CI/CD pipeline with integrated security analysis to detect vulnerabilities before deployment.
project1.fullDescription: This project aimed to integrate security directly into the development process of a team of 20 developers, automating security analyses and enforcing quality gates before production deployment.
objectives: Block deployment in case of critical vulnerabilities
challenges: High number of false positives in analysis tools
Performance of SAST/DAST analyses in the pipeline
solutions: Implementation of a whitelist for identified false positives
Organization of awareness workshops for teams
Development of custom plugins for integration
Optimization of analyses through parallel execution

project2.title: Secure Cloud Infrastructure
project2.description: Design and implementation of a highly available and secure multi-region cloud infrastructure with Terraform.
project2.fullDescription: This project involved creating a robust cloud infrastructure for a finance application processing sensitive data, with a particular focus on security, high availability, and compliance with regulations.
objectives: Meet GDPR and PCI DSS requirements
solutions: Use of reusable Terraform modules
Integration with HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
Deployment of an ELK stack for log centralization
Automation of documentation generation with Terraform

project3.title: Secure Web Application
project3.description: Development of a web application with strong authentication and protection against common attacks.
project3.fullDescription: This project involved developing a modern web application for a healthcare company, with a particular emphasis on data security and protection against common web attacks.
objectives: Prevent XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection attacks
solutions: Use of secure libraries for authentication
Systematic validation and escaping of user inputs
Automated test suite including security scenarios
Query optimization and caching

project4.title: Penetration Testing Automation
project4.description: Creation of a framework to automate penetration testing in pre-production environments.
project4.fullDescription: This project aimed to automate the detection of security vulnerabilities in applications before their deployment to production, allowing development teams to quickly identify and fix security issues.
objectives: Integrate results into existing tracking tools
Prioritize vulnerabilities based on their impact
solutions: Development of an API to configure tests
Use of custom rules for each application
Algorithm for validating detected vulnerabilities
Dashboard with trend visualization

project5.title: Monitoring Platform
project5.description: Implementation of a centralized monitoring and alerting platform for a multi-cloud infrastructure.
project5.fullDescription: This project consisted of developing a comprehensive monitoring solution to track the performance and security of a distributed infrastructure across multiple cloud providers, with anomaly detection and automatic alerts.
objectives: Centralize monitoring of multiple cloud environments
challenges: Large volume of metrics to process
Maintaining the availability of the platform itself
solutions: Use of standardized collectors for each environment
Distributed architecture with automatic scaling
Implementation of anomaly detection algorithms
Setup of redundant monitoring

project6.title: SSO Authentication System
project6.description: Design and implementation of a secure single sign-on system for an ecosystem of internal applications.
project6.fullDescription: This project aimed to simplify the user experience while enhancing security by implementing a single sign-on (SSO) solution for all internal company applications.
solutions: Implementation based on OAuth2 and OIDC
Migration script with strict validation
Multi-zone redundant architecture
Comprehensive logging and audit system
